strapiEdition.headline: A Little Bit Of Chicken Fried

sponsor.partnerMessage: Centsei has helped 1,400+ individuals and couples accelerate their finances and move toward their goals. Join Dan and Kay for a free online budgeting class on Jun 13 at 8p. Register HERE.

posts.title: 63rd Annual Poultry Festival Flocks To Rogers
posts.content:
The top poultry and egg industry leaders from around the country will gather for the 63rd Annual Poultry Festival, enjoying a weekend of networking and team building at the Rogers Convention Center from Jun 9-10.

  • Eggsellent time: The two-day festival offers a variety of activities ‚Äî golf and fishing tournaments, trap shooting, women in poultry brunch, scholarship auction, awards ceremony, cooking competitions, and more along a Vegas-themed stretch called the Chicken Strip. ‚Äì and will conclude with a concert by Chris Janson with special guests Ray Fulcher and Southerland on Jun 10 at the Walmart AMP.
  • Golden yolk: Arkansas's robust poultry industry supports over 158,000 jobs and generates over $39b annually. Last year, the Poultry Festival sold over 4,500 tickets, bringing $4.19m to the Rogers economy.

Register as a group or purchase individual passes HERE.

posts.title: Gear Up For The Bentonville Film Festival
posts.content:
The Bentonville Film Festival begins next week, Jun 13-18, and this year's film lineup includes some fantastic outdoor programming for the NWA cycling community, from films to interactive bike tours.

  • We're rolling: New to the festival this year, Rolling Canvas Bike Adventure, led by OZ Art NWA, will celebrate the intersection of art, film, and cycling ‚Äî leading participants on a community art ride via an exclusive route throughout Bentonville, followed by a screening in partnership with Oz Art.
  • Pass the popcorn: Several of the screenings center around cycling, including the world premiere spotlight of Hard Miles, which tells the story of a youth prison social worker who leads a cycling team of teenage convicts on a transformative 1000-mi ride, and several exciting Adventure Shorts, including A Well Worn Life presented by Bentonville-based LIVSN Designs.

See the full festival schedule and purchase festival passes or individual screenings tickets HERE.

posts.title: Pack Rat Outdoor Center Celebrating Fifty Years Of Adventure
posts.content:
Founded by Scott and Carolyn Crook in 1973, Pack Rat Outdoor Center will host its 50th Anniversary Celebration the week of Jul 23-29, including daily drawings for gift cards and a huge party on the 29th with food, music, and games!

  • Packed & ready: Pack Rat features a huge selection of gear and clothing for hiking, floating, climbing, and camping and provides services like pack fitting, gear repair, and roof rack, kayak & bike carrier installation.
  • Unpacked: Not just a gear store, the Outdoor Center is deeply embedded in the community and regularly hosts a variety of skills clinics and fundraising events, like Pint Nights each spring and fall, to support local nonprofits.

To celebrate 50 years of Pack Rat, we're giving away a sit-on-top Tidal Kayak to one of our NWA Daily Fans! If you're part of our Fan Program, reply to this email for a chance to win!

posts.title: J.B. Hunt Enters Top 300 of Fortune 500
posts.content:
J.B. Hunt has been named to the Fortune 500 for the eleventh consecutive year, landing the 280th spot ‚Äî the company's first time to break into the top 300.

  • On the list: Fortune has published its annual Fortune 500 list since 1955, ranking the largest companies in the U.S. by total revenue for the respective fiscal year. J.B. Hunt's first appearance was in 2013 at 485. 
  • The trophy shelf: This recognition adds to J.B. Hunt's recent accolades ‚Äî the company was also listed on Fortune's list of World's Most Admired Companies earlier this year, and Newsweek recognized J.B. Hunt as one of America's Greatest Workplaces for Women and Greatest Workplaces for Diversity. 

Read more about J.B. Hunt HERE.

posts.title: Take The Guilt And The Guesswork Out Of Personal Finance With Centsei
posts.content:
If you feel behind or stuck when it comes to money, you're not alone. That's why Dan and Kay created Centsei to help individuals and couples accelerate their finances with financial systems that actually work. 

  • Get unstuck: Centsei has helped over 1,400 people stop feeling guilty about spending money, clarify financial direction, get rid of debt, build up savings, invest with confidence, automate with the right financial tools, and implement a repeatable cycle that will help you accomplish any financial goal.
  • Free course: Dan and Kay are hosting a free online budgeting class on Jun 13 at 8p, discussing the four biggest mistakes most people make when it comes to saving and how to fix them, how to select the right tools to automate, how couples can stop fighting and work together towards both their dreams. 

If you're ready to figure out your finances, register HERE.
